title: Variable land.fx.sftlkf_ti-u-hxy-u (fx.sftlkf)
Comment: Fraction of horizontal land grid cell area occupied by lake.
Long name: Fraction of the Grid Cell Occupied by Lake

title: Variable land.fx.lithk_ti-u-hxy-u (fx.lithk)
Comment: This variable identifies the thickness of a prescribed ice sheet. This information is relevant to better understand how different models treat ice. For models where an ice sheet is just orography + an ice sheet mask, the value should be set to zero. For models that explicitly resolve an ice sheet thickness, the thickness of the ice sheet should be provided.

title: Variable land.fx.depthsl_ti-u-hxy-u (fx.depthsl)
Comment: Total (cumulative) thickness of all soil layers. This is the sum of individual thicknesses of all soil layers.
Long name: Total (Cumulative) Thickness of All Soil Layers

title: Variable land.fx.depthl_ti-u-hxy-u (fx.depthl)
Comment: Depth of lakes, if this quantity is present in the model. If computed via volume and area, then this is lake volume divided by lake area.
Long name: Depth of Lake Below the Surface

title: Variable land.day.irr_tavg-u-hm-u (day.irrSurf)
Comment: the amount of water withdrawal for irrigation from surface water, including rivers, lakes, reservoirs, etc.)
Long name: irrigation water withdrawal from surface water

title: Variable land.day.irr_tavg-u-hm-u (day.irrLut)
Comment: the total amount of water withdrawal from multiple sources

title: Variable land.day.irrGw_tavg-u-hm-u (day.irrGw)
Comment: the amount of water withdrawal for irrigation from ground water, including deep soil water, confined and unconfined aquifer, etc

title: Variable land.day.irrDem_tavg-u-hm-u (day.irrDem)
Comment: the total amount of irrigation water demand

title: Variable land.mon.fHarvestToGeologicStorage_tavg-u-hxy-lnd (Lmon.fHarvestToGeologicStorage)
Comment: Flux of carbon harvested from biomass that goes into geologic storage for the purposes of intentional carbon dioxide removal, via efforts such as bioenergy with carbon capture and storage (BECCS) or biomass removal and storage (BiCRS). The definition of geologic storage here is that the resulting carbon be  stored for a period of time that is long relative to that of the simulation.
Long name: Harvested Biomass That Goes into Geological Storage
Processing notes: Positive number represents a flux of carbon from biomass (down) to geologic storage.

title: Variable land.mon.cGeologicStorage_tavg-u-hm-u (Lmon.cGeologicStorage)
Comment: Mass of carbon that has been intentionally sequestered in geologic storage. The definition of geologic storage here is that it be stored for periods of time that are long as compared to the simulation.
Processing notes: This variable should only contain carbon that is stored through processes that are represented by the Earth system model itself, not carbon that is stored solely on the basis of a forcing dataset. For example, if an ESM represents biomass energy with carbon capture and storage (BECCS) as a prognostic process, then the resulting carbon storage would be included here; whereas if a process like direct air capture (DAC) is represented solely as a negative carbon emissions flux in the scenario forcing dataset, then it would not be included here.

title: Variable land.mon.rsus_tavg-u-hxy-sn (Emon.rsuss)
Comment: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of a land grid cell covered by snow. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over Snow
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsus

title: Variable land.mon.rsus_tavg-u-hxy-ufs (Emon.rsuslni)
Cell methods: area: time: mean where unfrozen_soil (at the surface, but frozen below zero isotherm)
Comment: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of a land grid cell not covered by ice sheets or snow. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over Land Not Covered by Ice Sheets or Snow
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsus.

title: Variable land.mon.?_tavg-u-hxy-is (Emon.rsusis)
Comment: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over the ice-sheet covered portion of a grid cell, including snow. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation over Ice Sheets
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsus.

title: Variable land.mon.rsds_tavg-u-hxy-sn (Emon.rsdss)
Comment: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of a land grid cell covered by snow but not by ice. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over Snow
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsds

title: Variable land.mon.rsds_tavg-u-hxy-ufs (Emon.rsdslni)
Cell methods: area: time: mean where unfrozen_soil (at the surface, but frozen below zero isotherm)
Comment: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over the portion of a land grid cell not covered by ice sheets or snow. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over Land Not Covered by Ice Sheets or Snow
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsds.

title: Variable land.mon.?_tavg-u-hxy-is (Emon.rsdsis)
Comment: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over the ice-sheet covered portion of a grid cell, including snow. Can be used for computation of surface albedo.
Long name: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation over Ice Sheets
Processing notes: other than the different rule for spatial averaging, the variable is equivalent to Amon.rsds.

title: Variable land.mon.cnc_tavg-u-hxy-u (Emon.cnc)
Cell methods: area: mean where land time: mean
Comment: Canopy covered fraction

title: Variable land.mon.albsn_tavg-u-hxy-sn (Emon.albsn)
Comment: This is similar to Eday.albsn, but providing monthly averages

title: Variable land.mon.albc_tavg-u-hxy-veg (Emon.albc)
Cell methods: area: mean where land time: mean
Comment: Canopy Albedo

title: Variable land.day.rhVgt_tavg-u-hxy-lus (Eday.rhVgt)
Comment: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to heterotrophic respiration on land (respiration by consumers), calculated on vegetation type.
Long name: Heterotrophic Respiration on Vegetation type as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]

title: Variable land.day.raVgt_tavg-u-hxy-lnd (Eday.raVgt)
Comment: Carbon mass flux per unit area into atmosphere due to autotrophic respiration on land (respiration by producers) [see rh for heterotrophic production]. Calculated on vegetation type.
Long name: Autotrophic Respiration on Vegetation type as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]

title: Variable land.day.nppVgt_tavg-u-hxy-lus (Eday.nppVgt)
Comment: "Production of carbon" means the production of biomass expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. Net primary production is the excess of gross primary production (rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors) by autotrophs ("producers"), for example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton, over the rate at which the autotrophs themselves respire some of this biomass. "Productivity" means production per unit area. The phrase "expressed_as" is used in the construction A_expressed_as_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A.
Long name: Net Primary Production on Vegetation type as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]

title: Variable land.day.mrsol_tavg-z1m-hxy-lnd (Eday.mrso10)
Cell methods: area: mean where land time: mean
Comment: Soil moisture in the top 10 cm of the soil column

title: Variable land.day.mrro_tavg-u-hxy-lnd (Eday.mrro)
Comment: The total run-off (including drainage through the base of the soil model) per unit area leaving the land portion of the grid cell.

title: Variable land.day.lai_tavg-u-hxy-lus (Eday.laiVgt)
Comment: A ratio obtained by dividing the total upper leaf surface area of vegetation by the (horizontal) surface area of the land on which it grows.
Long name: Leaf Area Index on Vegetation type

title: Variable land.day.gpp_tavg-u-hxy-lus (Eday.gppVgt)
Comment: The rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors by autotrophs ("producers") expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. For example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton. The producers also respire some of this biomass and the difference is referred to as the net primary production. Reported on land-use tiles.
Long name: Gross Primary Production on Vegetation type as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]

title: Variable land.day.evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-u (Eday.evspsblveg)
Comment: The same as the current variable evspsblveg but defined on daily timescales.
Long name: Daily water evaporation flux from canopy

title: Variable land.day.evspsblsoi_tavg-u-hxy-u (Eday.evspsblsoi)
Comment: Water evaporation flux from soil but for daily averages i.e., the evspsblsoi variable, which is only currently defined for monthly averages
Long name: Daily water evaporation flux from soil

title: Variable land.1hr.tas_tavg-u-hxy-u (E1hr.tas)
Comment: Hourly Temperature at 2m above the surface

title: Variable land.3hr.bldep_tpt-u-hxy-u (3hrPt.bldep)
Comment: Boundary Layer Depth every 3 hours

title: Variable land.3hr.tran_tavg-u-hxy-u (3hr.tran)
Comment: Transpiration

title: Variable land.3hr.rss_tavg-u-hxy-u (3hr.srfrad)
Comment: Net radiative flux at surface

title: Variable land.3hr.mrsol_tavg-z1m-hxy-lnd (3hr.mrso10)
Cell methods: area: mean where land time: mean
Comment: Soil moisture at 3hr but for 0-1m

title: Variable land.3hr.mrros_tavg-u-hxy-lnd (3hr.mrros)
Cell methods: area: mean where land time: mean
Comment: surface_runoff_flux

title: Variable land.3hr.hfdsl_tavg-u-hxy-u (3hr.hfdsl)
Comment: Ground heat flux at 3hr

title: Variable land.3hr.evspsblveg_tavg-u-hxy-u (3hr.evspsblveg)
Comment: Evaporation from canopy

title: Variable land.3hr.evspsblsoi_tavg-u-hxy-u (3hr.evspsblsoi)
Comment: Water evaporation from soil
